title: Spartacus : Blood and Sand S01 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
Betrayed by the Romans , trapped into slavery , reborn as a gladiator . The classic tale of the Republic 's most famous rebel comes alive in Rome visceral new series called Spartacus : Blood and Sand . Torn from his home and the woman he loves Earth , Spartacus is condemned to live in the brutal world of the arena where blood and death are fun crowd . But not all battles are fought in the sand . Treachery , corruption, and the attraction of sensual pleasures constantly will test Spartacus . To survive , he must become more than a man , more than a gladiator. He must become a legend .
